title: Advanced Applications of the Wicked Sign
description: The wicked sign is a symbol of forbidden power, used in advanced magical practices.

pages.text: The wicked sign allows practitioners to tap into dark energies for powerful effects.
Ink preparation is crucial for inscribing the wicked sign. Only the purest dark ink will suffice.
Sign placement determines the effectiveness and safety of the wicked sign's magic.
Dark energies can be harnessed through the wicked sign, but must be controlled with care.
